about_the_game:
Character & Classes

Choose from a diverse of unique character classes, each with their own distinct playstyle, weapons, and abilities. Whether you prefer being a stealthy assasin, an armed tanker, or a versatile healer, there's a class to suit your preferred.

Progression & Customization

Unlock new character, weapon, and special abilities as you progress in play the game by collecting combat points. Customize your character's appearance and loadout to create a unique playstyle that reflects your personality through in-game purchases.

Third-Person Perspective

Experience adrenaline-pumping laser fights from a third-person perspective that provides players a wider field of view, allowing for better situational awareness & strategic maneuvering. Engage in fast-paced battles, utilizing a variety of weapons, abilities, and tactics.

Competitive Ranking System

In Virtuar Z, the competitive ranking system is designed to reflect a player's skill level and provide a matchmaking experience that is balanced and competitive. As you win streak 5 matches, you can progress through the ranks. These tiers represent the skill level and matchmaking ranking of players. Here is a general overview of the tier pool in Virtuar Z. Zenith is the highest tier in Virtuar Z and is reserved for the absolute best players in the game.

Futuristic Collection Cards

In Virtuar Z, collection cards are a part of the game's progression system that allows players to customize and enhance their gameplay experience.
Here are some key points about collection cards:
Unlocking and Upgrading - Collection cards can be obtained by earning them through gameplay or by opening crates.
Enhancing Abilities - Each collection card provides a specific enhancement or ability to your character or class.
Customization - Collection cards allow you to customize your playstyle and tailor your character or class to your preferences.

Elemental Weapon System

In Virtuar Z, there are a variety of elemental weapon system and their effect that players can use.

content_descriptors.notes: Players will compete in combat shooting and will see shooting scenes between player vs player or player vs robot, there are no sexual scenes in this game, there are scenes of being killed but they are not made with extreme scenes or animations and all the characters are made using armor costumes or modest costumes

Choose from a diverse of unique character classes, each with their own distinct playstyle, weapons, and abilities. Whether you prefer being a stealthy assasin, an armed tanker, or a versatile healer, there's a class to suit your preferred.

legal_notice:
Guidelines for Ethical Behavior and Sportsmanship

Welcome to our game that offers a combination of free roam, capture the flag, and death match experiences. To maintain an enjoyable and respectful gaming environment, let's adhere to the following guidelines. Remember, good ethics are the key to creating a positive gaming experience.

General:

Respect Fellow Players: Show respect to all players, regardless of their backgrounds, skill levels, or viewpoints.

Avoid Harmful Behavior: Refrain from intimidation, harassment, or the use of offensive language towards other players.

No Cheating: Steer clear of all forms of cheating, including using illegal tools or unfair tactics to gain an advantage.

Positive Communication: Use appropriate language and avoid using rude or demeaning words.
Cooperation: In free roam mode, interact positively and support your fellow players.


Capture the Flag Ethics:

Team Collaboration: Collaborate with your team to devise strategies for capturing the enemy flag and defending your own.

Give Opportunities: Provide chances for other players to participate, avoiding domination of the game.

Respect for Opponents: After a successful match, show appreciation for the opposing team and avoid displays of arrogance.



Death Match Ethics:

Tactical Thinking: Utilize strategy and tactical thinking during battles. Don't solely rely on brute force attacks.
Fair Play: Accept the outcome of battles with sportsmanship, refraining from belittling talk or acting superior.

Player Rotation: If a single player is dominating, consider taking turns to balance the teams.

Communication and Conflict:

Positive Attitude: Use in-game communication for positive and strategic purposes. Refrain from using it to disrupt the atmosphere.

Conflict Resolution: Address conflicts calmly and engage in respectful conversations. Seek help from a moderator if necessary.

Collaborate: During conflicts, try to find collaborative solutions to maintain a positive gaming environment.

Prohibited Content:

No Casino Content: Avoid discussing or promoting gambling in any form.

No Adult Material: Steer clear of all forms of adult or explicit content.
Avoid Disturbing Content: Refrain from promoting violence, hatred, or discrimination in any form.

Consequences for Violations:

Warning: First-time violations may result in a warning from a moderator.

Temporary Suspension: Continued violations may lead to a temporary suspension from playing.

Permanent Removal: Serious or repeated violations can result in a permanent block from the game.

By following these guidelines, you help create a positive and enjoyable gaming environment for all players. Let's together uphold the values of respect and ethics while playing.
name: Virtuar Z

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Virtuar Z is a sci-fi third-person shooter game set in the future in a city full of conflict. Experience adrenaline-pumping laser combat from a third-person perspective that gives players a wider field of view, allowing for better situational awareness & strategic maneuvers.
